name: CLKSimpleTextProvider
desc: A single line of text to display in your complication interface.

items.name: init(text: String)
items.desc: Creates and returns a text provider with the specified long form text.

items.name: init(text: String, shortText: String?)
items.desc: Creates and returns a text provider with both long and short versions of the text.

items.name: init(text: String, shortText: String?, accessibilityLabel: String?)
items.desc: Creates and returns a text provider with the text strings and an accessible string.

items.name: var text: String
items.desc: The long version of text that you want to display.

items.name: var shortText: String?
items.desc: A shorter version of the text.
